I think you might enjoy "The Monuments Men"! It's a fascinating true story about a group of art experts who go behind enemy lines during WWII to rescue priceless artworks from being destroyed. With an all-star cast, including George Clooney and Matt Damon, this film is a thrilling adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Or, if you're in the mood for something a bit more unique, "The Prince" might be right up your alley! This Shakespearean-inspired tale takes place in a multiverse where characters from different worlds intersect, and it's got some truly clever writing and world-building. Give it a try if you're looking for something that will challenge your expectations and keep you guessing.

With outstanding performances from Bill Hader and Kristen Wiig, this 2014 indie gem is sure to leave you pondering long after the credits roll.
